package.name: PatrioticAmericanTheme
package.shortDescription: A Patriotic American Theme by u/h20net

descriptionlist.description: A Patriotic American Theme by u/h20net

A Patriotic American Theme containing 53 icons. This includes all the default applications of ios 11 and 12 +

-unc0ver (jailbreak application)
-Cydia
-Sileo
-iCleaner Pro
-Twitter
-Facebook
-Youtube
-Twitch
-Reddit
-Fox News
-Snapchat
-Instagram
-Messanger
-WhatsApp
-Google Chrome
-Google Maps
The theme is tested on ios 11 with SnowBoard but is expected to work with Anemone as well.
I will add more if I find more copyright free NFL themed icons. If you experience any problems please contact me!
